::DrillBit::

DrillBit heard KitKat's request, and walked to the main room.
"Sure. Is there an exit, on that end? I dont want to go through those
Maximals." He said.
DrillBit was a bit upset with himself, for letting that Maximal stick
his gun right in his face.
